titles.title: I Have Decided To Follow Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have decided to follow Jesus.
I have decided to follow Jesus.
I have decided to follow Jesus.
No turning back, no turning back.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though none go with me, still I will follow. (3x)
No turning back, no turning back.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The world behind me, the cross before me (3x)
No turning back, no turning back.
